title: 10 games chat restriction,played them and still cant earn keys.What do i do?
body: recently i got matched with trolls in some games in a row,the last 2 games i played i got tired of them so i just flamed them with sarcasm,i got chat restriction for 10 games and after i played them i still cant earn any rewards from the loot system,i read that i have to improve my behavior,how is that done?By getting honored for ex. friendly/teamwork etc..?Or i can start getting loot after some period of time?

replies.body:
>If you've been punished by the instant feedback system recently for negative behavior, you'll be locked out of earning chests and keys from playing games until you've shown progress toward positive play.

>The length of time you're restricted from earning loot is relative to two things:

>* Severity of punishment. You won't earn loot for the duration of your punishment, be it a temporary suspension or a chat restriction.
* Signs of reform. Once your punishment has ended, you'll continue to be restricted from earning loot until you're recognized to have made significant progress in amending your past behavior.

>Stay focused on solid comms, teamwork, and sportsmanship in your games and you'll be earning chests and keys sooner rather than later.

The "significant progress in amending past behaviour" isn't measured over a set period of time e.g you wont start earning loot exactly 2 weeks after the end of your punishment, but instead is completely reliant on you not being a sarcastic flamer in your games. It is different for every player. 
 

[Take a look at this for more info](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209939463-Hextech-Crafting-Restrictions)♥

I've been nice for at least 4 weeks and i still haven't been getting any keys or chests. Also the only reason I have to go through this is because of my "friend" was real salty in a lot of ranked games

There isn't a set time. It could take 4 weeks, it could take 40. Nobody knows and the number is specific to you.

How your friend behaves does not effect your punishment

You've entered what is known as the "Reform" period. During this time you can gain rewards like keys or chests from games.

The actual length of the reform period is different for everybody. The time needed to "reform" depends entirely on what your punishment was, how long it went for and your continued behaviour during this period.

You got punished because you were a dick. Since loot is a reward, Riot don't want to reward people for "Not being a Dick" because not being a dick should be standard. If you want rewards you gotta show progress in amending your past behavior. So you gotta start being nice.
No one has commented yet but I hears that once you have had some sort of punishment you cant receive any sort of bonus or reward until next season
